attributes.action: As a student, we have the right to go to the restroom when need,No questions.
attributes.additional_details: Because i knew a friend and he need to use the restroom and the teacher said “no wait till lunch” lunch was 2 hours away. if you were caught going to the rest room inbetween lessons you would get a punishment which ment you would have to wait till the end of the day to leave to the restroom. As it is a need for children to do this to maintain a good bladder, They should be able to go when they please.
attributes.background: to tell schools students should be allowed to use the restroom as it isn’t safe for children to hold in there bladder.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

Require schools to allow students to have access to the toilet during lessons:
